DOC.brief_summary: In this research study we want to understand the effectiveness of a drug treatment, acamprosate, for interfering symptoms (i.e., inattention/hyperactivity, social impairment) associated with Fragile X Syndrome (FXS).
DOC.brief_title: Study of Acamprosate in Fragile x Syndrome
